item.title: Comprehensive Guide to Integrating Swagger with Spring
item.description: In the development process, the interface documentation is a crucial part. It not only facilitates developers in viewing and understanding the functionality and parameters of the interfaces but also helps in coordinating the work between the front-end and back-end development, thereby improving development efficiency. This article will introduce how to use Swagger in Spring Boot to automatically generate interface documentation.

item.title: Chart of Ionizing Radiation Doses Absorbed by Individuals
item.description: This is a chart of the ionizing radiation dose a person can absorb from various sources. The unit for absorbed dose is “Sievert” (Sv), and measures the effect a dose of radiation will have on the cells of the body. One sievert (all at once) will make you sick, and too many more will kill you, but we safely absorb small amounts of natural radiation daily.

item.title: Blender: A Powerful and Flexible Software for 3D Design and Rendering
item.description: Blender is the free and open source 3D creation suite. It supports the entirety of the 3D pipeline—modeling, rigging, animation, simulation, rendering, compositing and motion tracking, even video editing and game creation.

item.title: FRM Part Ⅰ: Quantitative Analysis
item.description: The Quantitative Analysis is Chapter 2 of Part 1 for the FRM exam. This chapter primarily covers probability and statistics, hypothesis testing and estimation, time series analysis, risk management and portfolio management, and derivatives and risk models.

item.title: FRM Part Ⅰ: Foundations of Risk Management
item.description: The Fundamentals of Risk Management is Chapter 1 of Part 1 for the FRM exam. This chapter primarily covers the foundational knowledge, theories and best practices related to the subject of risk management.

item.title: Financial Risk Manager Introduction
item.description: The Financial Risk Manager (FRM) Certification is the true standard for educational excellence in risk management and a gateway to achieving new career heights in the risk profession.
